edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.identity

Class ToolIdentity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.identity.ToolIdentity

  • public class ToolIdentity
extends java.lang.Object
    Information about a file's format, MIME type, and identifiers, as provided by a single tool.
